snippet: Christmas has already been celebrated at Dwyane Wade's house. His wife and kids unwrapped their presents on Wednesday night, since waiting until Sunday morning wasn't an option this year....
lead_paragraph: Christmas has already been celebrated at Dwyane Wade's house. His wife and kids unwrapped their presents on Wednesday night, since waiting until Sunday morning wasn't an option this year.

headline.main: For Wade and Others, NBA Christmas Games Remain a Privilege
headline.print_headline: For Wade and Others, NBA Christmas Games Remain a Privilege
